name: Wallander (Season 4)
summary: Kenneth Branagh has announced that the BBC Wallander series will be closed with a final three-episode fourth series. It will consist of an adaptation of The White Lioness and a two-episode adaptation of Mankell's final Wallander novel, The Troubled Man.
